title: Short Ghost and Horror Collection 008
creator: Various
description: A collection of fifteen stories featuring ghoulies, ghosties, long-leggedy beasties and things that go bump in the night. Expect shivers up your spine, the stench of human flesh, and the occasional touch of wonder. Readers include: Roger Clifton StephenC John Feaster Stephen Ball om123 Erin B. Lillis Psudonae Vox Gregg Margarite Bill Boerst M4B format available
subject: librivox; audio; audiobook; ghost; horror; short fiction
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
